My Services

Design Guarantee

I’ll design it until you’re happy

Because I stand by my work, I offer clients a design guaranteed. They will know exactly what their website will look like when launched, leaving no surprises at the end. I believe this approach encourages creativity and innovation with each project, which leads to design satisfaction from my clients. I work closely with my team of marketers and developers in order to best brand our client and to incorporate functional solutions that are critical to the website's success.

Services I am Best At

Bespoke Web Design

I offer truly bespoke web design services. I pay special attention to each client's brand, making them marketable at their web design appealing. This results in optimal branding for the client. The purpose of friendliness to stand out amongst competitors. It's meant to personalize your companies image. In order to a complex this, I highly recommend investing in my custom website design services. My team and I built the most current and effective layouts for each website design we create. These unique designs are tailored to each company's brand and image, which is kept in mind throughout the entire process. Unlike template designs, all the cars are standalone, unique designs.

Responsive Web Design

For all browsers and devices

Because of the rapidly increasing use of mobile devices, my web designs are created as responsive website designs. Starting with design mockups, the code my team and I use translates across all mobile devices and browsers. The code we write is clean, and effective. The end result is a fast loading and visually appealing website. We know that there are many web browsers available, and therefore, we craft your websites to be compatible with each of them, such as: Internet Explorer, Safari, Firefox, iOS and the Android browser.

Stunning Web Graphics

I make it look different & User friendly

In today's visual world, it's imperative to have quality graphics on your website. My team and I ensure that the graphics we use don't slow your website down, but rather enhance the visual experience for your customers

Custom WordPress Design

I know the difference of custom and customized

The popularity of WordPress, many of my clients ask for assistance with the WordPress website. They want the simplicity of WordPress, with the customization ability to match their brand. With the tools available to me, I incorporate branding, web design, graphics, WordPress integration, PHP/HTML/CSS/JavaScript coding, and content writing in order to design the best possible website. Let my years of experience go to work for you.

Website Speed Optimization

A slow website can make or break whether or not a visitor sticks around. In fact, they say that 57% of online shoppers will stick around for more than 3 seconds. Keeping this in mind, my team and I program websites to load faster than those 3 seconds, all while adhering to the integrity and quality of the graphics and user experience. Your web design will include these features: I will:

  1. Optimize html code
  2. Removal of unnecessary code to include: CSS/JavaScript
  3. Merge multiple JavaScript files into one file, reducing http requests
  4. Merge background images into one image through CSS sprites.
  5. Minify the need for CSS and JavaScript.

eCommerce Web Design

Naturally, many clients that come to me have products to sell. This means they want visitors to be able to online shop and go through customer checkouts on their site. My goal is to make it as easy and streamlined as possible for the client and their customers. In addition, I often design and integrate Magento based eCommerce stores from scratch.

Dynamic Web Applications

Every website I design contains built-in, flexible content management systems. This allows clients to receive a dynamic custom website design that allows them to add or edit content in a specific area without needing to understand programming. With nearly a decade experience of developing powerful web apps, my team and I have worked on many large projects to include social networking sites and e-commerce solutions. Our code is cleanly written and user-friendly for all of our client designed apps.

Consistent Branding

Solidifying the company brand is important for customer experience and recognition. We understand that you want your customers to be able to identify your brand, and because of this we pay special attention to branding, ensuring that it is consistent with the client and their needs.
